EmailTemplate.name: ForEOIWithoutBooking
EmailTemplate.subject: {EOI/CA} for {projectName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {customerName},
Flat is not yet booked for {EOI_CA_Number} for {projectName}. Please do the booking within 7 days otherwise it will automatically cancelled.
In case of any queries or assistance required, please contact us on {projectNumber}.
Regards, Dynamix Group
